definition: board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Wielding a pair of hatchets , Li Kui charged over.
sentences.chinese: 李魁把板斧一揮，衝了過來。

sentences.english: Cheng bite gold is carrying big head. it said he will guard the during.
sentences.chinese: 程咬金卻是提着大板斧表示自己要護衛李世民到底。

sentences.english: Wielding a pair of hatchets, Li Kui rushed in.
sentences.chinese: 李逵把板斧一揮，衝了出來。

sentences.english: Bolton defend deep in the second-half and Chelsea run out of ideas.
sentences.chinese: 博爾頓在下半場嚴密防守，而切爾西亦無板斧破解。

sentences.english: A cleaving tool having a heavy blade set at right angles to the handle.
sentences.chinese: 劈板斧有垂直於斧柄的厚刃的劈東西的工具。

definition: ancient spear-like weapon 18 Chinese feet 尺[chi3] in length, with a wavy spearhead like a snake's body,
mace (weapon)/see 銅錘花臉|铜锤花脸[tong2 chui2 hua1 lian3]
Buddhist monk's knife (not used for killing)
pitchfork/garden fork/restraining pole (used by police)/military fork (of ancient times)
ancient spear-like weapon with a wavy spearhead like a snake's body
the staff of a Buddhist monk
